name: .FTZ
summary: Learn about .FTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an FTZ file in Digital Gene Quick Family Tree (Android, iOS). To do so, move your file to a device that has Quick Family Tree installed, tap the file until your device's Open with... menu appears, and select Family Tree. Quick Family Tree will then open and prompt you to import your FTZ file. After importing your file, go to Quick Family Tree's Data manager to open it.
FTZ files cannot be converted to other file formats.
